chapter.title: Affinity
chapter.body: Can you dance, Commander? You see, um... I was wondering if you could teach me how to do it...

review.title: I wish I was as popular as Kirishima... Well, kind of...
review.body: I'm Haruna, the Sakura Empire's speediest fast battleship. I fought hard till the very end. Once more, I will fight with all my heart, holding nothing back!
